description: This is a test script for the 'universalinit' project, specifically testing retrieval of run commands for different project types using pytest framework and mock objects.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Class representing initialization info including the run tool command.

classes.name: RunTool
classes.description: Class representing a command to run a project with its working directory.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Class responsible for creating project templates.

methods.name: handle_get_run_command
methods.description: Function to handle getting the run command for a project type.

methods.name: create_minimal_project_config
methods.description: Function to create a minimal project configuration given a project type.
